name: Gazillionfund
tag_list: guide-to-crowdfunding, global-crowdfunding, crowdfunding, kickstarter-for-technology, online-crowdfunding, reward-based-crowdfunding, perk-based-crowdfunding, crowdfunding-for-mobile-apps, crowdfunding-for-technology, crowdfunindg-for-it-internet, viral-m
overview:
Gazillionfund.com is A Free Viral Marketing and/or Perk Based Fundraising Site for IT/Mobile Apps Reaching Millions and Investors with just 1 click. Gazillionfund.com offers:

  1. Evidence that the companies/people are real.
  2. Outbound marketing where you can reach out to millions and investors with 1 click posting to 340 social media sites.
  3. Worldwide but localized VC/Angel partners.
  4. Low closing cost: 1-5%.
  5. Fundraisers get however much they raise starting at minimum $100.
  6. We’re focused on internet and Mobile App companies/projects.
  7. Enter in at any stage. There are 8 categories within the IT, Tech, & Mobile App industries: 1. Entertainment/Gaming, 2. Tools/Resources, 3. Health/Fitness/Beauty, 4. Education/Consulting, 5. Marketplace/Ecommerce, 6. Travel/Leisure/Food, 7. Design/Marketing, 8. Google Glass
